API name: Parrot Flower Power Cloud Indirect API v1.0
Description: This API provides access to connect to the Flower Power Cloud, and retrieve your sensors’ data from it. The Parrot Pot is a smart flowerpot that helps your plants with a self-watering system and four built-in sensors that monitor light, temperature, soil moisture and fertilizer levels in real time. It sends out customized recommendations and alerts to help you better care for your plants.
